experience.title: TA Consultant
experience.description: Technical Assistance Consultant engaged at the forefront of public health and violence prevention initiatives.
highlights: Collaborate with CDC and Department of Defense on community violence prevention
Contribute to qualitative evaluation efforts for the Greater Washington Community Foundation
Train hundreds of personnel in public health approach to violence prevention
Serve as thought partner for Army USMA and Army Reserve on Integrated Violence Prevention

experience.title: Adjunct Professor
experience.description: Teaching public health courses and mentoring students in epidemiology and research methods.

experience.title: Prevention Director
experience.organization: Hope and Help Center of Central Florida
experience.description: Led prevention initiatives addressing pressing public health challenges.
highlights: Established Central Florida's first above-ground syringe service program
Led Prevention Department through COVID-19 pandemic response
Secured multi-million dollar prevention grant spanning five years
Directed dynamic team and conducted rigorous program evaluation

experience.title: Population Health Coordinator
experience.description: Coordinated population health initiatives and community outreach programs.

experience.title: Health Educator
experience.description: Coordinated health education and outreach activities for 15,000+ students across 3 campuses.
highlights: Created successful vaccination, smoking cessation, and safer sex campaigns

experience.title: Program Data Management Specialist
experience.description: Managed data and reporting for multiple federally funded grants.
highlights: Managed data for 4 multi-million dollar federal grants (CDC, SAMHSA, FL DOH)
Co-authored successful multi-million dollar 5-year SAMHSA Treatment grant

experience.title: Health Education Specialist
experience.description: Delivered health education and capacity building in international settings.
highlights: Led educational seminars for healthcare professionals
Developed comprehensive surveys and needs assessments
Adapted swiftly to diverse cultural contexts and organizational cultures

education.institution: Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health
